title: How Kansas Beat UNC to Win the NCAA National Championship
description: The Jayhawks rallied from a 16-point deficit to down the Tar Heels in a thrilling — and intensely physical — N.C.A.A. men’s basketball tournament championship game.
dc:creator: Billy Witz
media:description: Kansas players celebrating their win after beating North Carolina, 72-69, in the N.C.A.A. men's tournament.
